description: A Model Context Protocol server that enables Claude to interact with Telegram channels and groups through both direct API access and web scraping methods.

BROWSER_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout setting for browser operations in web scraping mode

TELEGRAM_API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID obtained from my.telegram.org

TELEGRAM_API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API hash obtained from my.telegram.org

TELEGRAM_DATA_PATH.description: Optional path to store session data and cookies

name: Telegram MCP Server
